about.description: With knowledge in full-stack development, I have specialized in frontend development and user-friendly interface design.
about.title: ABOUT ME
about.text:
Hello! My name is Moira Brun, I am a FullStack developer based in Argentina. I am able to collaborate in all areas of development, however, Frontend development and interface design are my great passion.
With a blend of experience working both autonomously and within agile teams, I've accumulated a rich understanding of the development process. Over my caree, I've honed my skills through real projects and different academic collaborations.
I profile myself as a proactive, dedicated, resilient, creative, and empathetic professional. I approach each project with tenacity and a growth and collaborative mindset. I believe in the power of collaboration and the importance of continuous learning. My goal is not only to contribute my expertise to exciting projects but also to learn from each experience, improving my craft along the way.
about.text2: When I am not programming, I enjoy outdoor activities. I also love cooking and training.

1.title: Creative Design

2.descripcion: Transform designs into atractive and functional web interfaces.

5.title: Clean Code
5.descripcion: Implement the best frontend development practices.

contact.title: Lets work together!
contact.description: I want to hear your idea and find out how we can work together! You can find me on my social media or send me an email right here.
contact.name: Name

1.description: Project to digitize the equestrian world consisting of a web management panel for administrators and a mobile app for different user profiles.

2.description: Landing page for an agricultural company with the aim of strengthening its digital presence by communicating the services offered and the added value of the company.

3.description: This innovative e-commerce platform connects travelers with a travel agency that provides personalized travel packages and activities. It is crafted to improve the user shopping experience and provide the admin with excellent management tools.

4.description: Individual academic project. It's fully responsive and functions like a recipe book, where the user can discover over 100 recipes, create their own recipes, and delete them if desired. Furthermore, users can search for recipes, filter and sort them alphabetically or by health rating.

5.description: Academic project where users can log in, search and filter over 750 characters from the Rick and Morty series, save their favorites, and delete them if desired.
